headline: Hartford Insurance Group (NYSE:HIG) Announces New CIO And Data Officer Leadership Changes
summary: Hartford Insurance Group (NYSE:HIG) recently restructured its leadership, appointing Shekar Pannala as CIO and Jeffery Hawkins as Chief Data, AI, and Operations Officer, both of whom bring extensive expertise to their new roles. This organizational shift reflects the company's commitment to technology and efficiency and aligns with its 11% share price rise during a quarter marked by market volatility. Despite negative trends with major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq posting significant...

headline: The Hartford Expands Roles For Two Key Executives
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., March 31, 2025--The Hartford has expanded the roles of two key executives and announced a new organizational structure for its Technology and Operations functions. Shekar Pannala was named the company’s chief information officer and leads Technology, as well as cyber security, infrastructure and cloud modernization. Jeffery Hawkins was named chief data, AI and operations officer. In addition to his work overseeing data, analytics and AI, Hawkins now leads Operations. Both Pannal
